description:
The spirit Tatara made a contract with. Corti, as Phoron calls her, is one of the eldest spirits in their world, having eight wings and called the Red Elder Spiritâ€” as well as other titles such as Crimson Annihilator or Bloody Duchess. She is entranced by young Phoron`s singing voice and thus decides to make a pact with him so he will be hers only.
Most of the time, Corti has the appearance of a child. She has a selfish character and dislikes it when Phoron is being kind to other girls.
name: Corticarte Apa Lagranges
